meanings.definition: A person who lifts heavy weights as a form of exercise.
meanings.sent1: Weightlifters train hard to build strength and muscle.
meanings.sent2: Many weightlifters compete in weightlifting competitions.
meanings.sent3: Why did the weightlifters bring a scale to the gym? To weigh their options!
meanings.sent4: The weightlifters in the gym were like giants lifting mountains.
meanings.sent5: The image of weightlifters hoisting massive barbells is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The act of lifting heavy weights as a form of exercise.
meanings.sent1: The gym was filled with the sound of clanging weights as weightlifters worked out.
meanings.sent2: Weightlifters need to focus on proper form to prevent injuries.
meanings.sent3: The weightlifters' dumbbells had a heated argument about who was heavier.
meanings.sent4: The weightlifters' determination lifted more than just weights; it lifted spirits.
meanings.sent5: The sight of weightlifters pushing their limits is truly inspiring.
